item.title: Elliott sees opportunities to create value at warehouse REIT Rexford Industrial
item.description: Rexford's premium assets, its consolidation in the REIT industry and discounted valuation makes the company a natural acquisition candidate.

item.title: This old tech name is now a top AI play, according to analysts
item.description: Dell reported second-quarter results on Thursday that surpassed analyst estimates on the top and bottom line.

item.title: These three stocks are oversold and primed for major gains
item.description: This week's list of the most oversold stocks on Wall Street include beverage maker Keurig Dr Pepper.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says these top picks have more upside ahead in September
item.description: Morgan Stanley said this week that investors should buy these five stocks that have more room to run.

item.title: Bank of America raises gold forecast, noting Trump threat to Federal Reserve independence
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank said it remains bullish on gold, "with a short-/medium-term target of US$4,000/oz."
